reviews.text: Already paid for a ticket and this pig wouldn't let me threw I needed to go out to get my bike so I could go home and he has being rude ignoring me I'm being an overall nark I'm not happy and I don't think I'll be travelling with southwesternrailway ever again.

The worst station to ever be stuck at or even go to, delays are daily and paying up to £10 to be stuck here is the worst - if you can jump the barriers or not pay by all means do so the service here is the worst I’ve ever seen ever

reviews.author_name: London Flareon Tokyo Ebisu - Swanslade 恵比寿-スワンズレイド
reviews.text: Staines is located in the Staines-upon-Thames area, the station is served by Southwest Trains, with kind staff, working facilities, and clean platforms Staines is a great station used by commuters and travellers, Staines-upon-Thames is among one of my favourite towns in Britain because of how quiet it is, there are plenty of shops nearby and lots to do.

I'm a carer for disabled children, whilst trying to get a child in a very heavy, specialised buggy onto the train the doors shut on the buggy with the child and their chair half in half out, about 4 staff members watched and didn't help or offer any assistance, A member of the public came to my aid. Staff there were useless when I needed them.
OK little station, shame about the older female member of staff #NoCustomerSkills
